title: I don't want a lot for Christmas

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Wish to not have a lot for christmas, granting a random player the "Christmas" status.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Everyone that visits you gets the Christmas status
-Everyone that a player with Christmas visits gets Christmas
-You copy an ability from each target you **directly** infect with Christmas
-Once all alive players have the Christmas Status you transform into Mariah Carey and the town is notified that "Mariah Carey has defrosted!"

desc:
Post 3258
*There is just one thing i need tonight~*
